alert.note: Alert for Harmon; Jackson (Oklahoma) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued October 27 at 7:15PM CDT until October 27 at 8:00PM CDT by NWS Norman-Oklahoma City
info.description: The National Weather Service in Norman has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southwestern Jackson County in southwestern Oklahoma... Southeastern Harmon County in southwestern Oklahoma... * Until 800 PM CDT. * At 715 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 8 miles north of Goodlett Texas, moving northeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...Ping pong ball size hail and 60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect hail damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Eldorado, Duke and McQueen. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.50 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
